title: Border Animation UI
description: A creative animated border effect project showcasing smooth CSS animations and modern UI interaction design.

title: Inter Batch Competition Website
description: A responsive event website built for managing and showcasing inter-batch competitions with structured layouts, smooth animations, and modern UI styling.

title: Activity Dashboard
description: A modern activity tracking dashboard featuring interactive UI components, structured layout design, and responsive data visualization for monitoring daily tasks and performance metrics.

title: Creative Animation Showcase
description: A visually engaging animation project demonstrating advanced CSS transitions, keyframe animations, and interactive UI effects to enhance modern web experiences.

title: Cursor Animation Effects
description: An interactive cursor animation project featuring custom pointer effects, smooth motion tracking, and dynamic UI responses to enhance user engagement and modern web aesthetics.

title: Clothing E-Commerce Website
description: A modern and responsive clothing e-commerce frontend built using React and Tailwind CSS, featuring reusable components, dynamic product rendering, and utility-first styling to deliver a clean, scalable, and real-world online shopping interface.
